prop.name: sku
prop.desc: The Stock Keeping Unit (SKU), i.e. a merchant-specific identifier for a product or service, or the product to which the offer refers.

prop.name: availabilityStarts
prop.desc: The beginning of the availability of the product or service included in the offer.

prop.name: availableDeliveryMethod
prop.desc: The delivery method(s) available for this offer.

prop.name: areaServed
prop.desc: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided.

prop.name: mpn
prop.desc: The Manufacturer Part Number (MPN) of the product, or the product to which the offer refers.

prop.name: serialNumber
prop.desc: The serial number or any alphanumeric identifier of a particular product. When attached to an offer, it is a shortcut for the serial number of the product included in the offer.

prop.name: ineligibleRegion
prop.desc:
The ISO 3166-1 (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) or ISO 3166-2 code, the place, or the GeoShape for the geo-political region(s) for which the offer or delivery charge specification is not valid, e.g. a region where the transaction is not allowed.

See also eligibleRegion.

prop.name: gtin8
prop.desc: The GTIN-8 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers. This code is also known as EAN/UCC-8 or 8-digit EAN. See GS1 GTIN Summary for more details.

prop.name: availability
prop.desc: The availability of this item—for example In stock, Out of stock, Pre-order, etc.

prop.name: priceSpecification
prop.desc: One or more detailed price specifications, indicating the unit price and delivery or payment charges.

prop.name: inventoryLevel
prop.desc: The current approximate inventory level for the item or items.

prop.name: eligibleTransactionVolume
prop.desc: The transaction volume, in a monetary unit, for which the offer or price specification is valid, e.g. for indicating a minimal purchasing volume, to express free shipping above a certain order volume, or to limit the acceptance of credit cards to purchases to a certain minimal amount.

prop.name: availableAtOrFrom
prop.desc: The place(s) from which the offer can be obtained (e.g. store locations).

prop.name: warranty
prop.desc: The warranty promise(s) included in the offer.

prop.name: includesObject
prop.desc: This links to a node or nodes indicating the exact quantity of the products included in the offer.

prop.name: eligibleQuantity
prop.desc: The interval and unit of measurement of ordering quantities for which the offer or price specification is valid. This allows e.g. specifying that a certain freight charge is valid only for a certain quantity.

prop.name: validFrom
prop.desc: The date when the item becomes valid.

prop.name: advanceBookingRequirement
prop.desc: The amount of time that is required between accepting the offer and the actual usage of the resource or service.

prop.name: validThrough
prop.desc: The date after when the item is not valid. For example the end of an offer, salary period, or a period of opening hours.

prop.name: gtin14
prop.desc: The GTIN-14 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers. See GS1 GTIN Summary for more details.

prop.name: gtin13
prop.desc: The GTIN-13 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers. This is equivalent to 13-digit ISBN codes and EAN UCC-13. Former 12-digit UPC codes can be converted into a GTIN-13 code by simply adding a preceeding zero. See GS1 GTIN Summary for more details.

prop.name: gtin12
prop.desc: The GTIN-12 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers. The GTIN-12 is the 12-digit GS1 Identification Key composed of a U.P.C. Company Prefix, Item Reference, and Check Digit used to identify trade items. See GS1 GTIN Summary for more details.

prop.name: seller
prop.desc: An entity which offers (sells / leases / lends / loans) the services / goods.  A seller may also be a provider.

prop.name: deliveryLeadTime
prop.desc: The typical delay between the receipt of the order and the goods either leaving the warehouse or being prepared for pickup, in case the delivery method is on site pickup.

prop.name: availabilityEnds
prop.desc: The end of the availability of the product or service included in the offer.

prop.name: businessFunction
prop.desc: The business function (e.g. sell, lease, repair, dispose) of the offer or component of a bundle (TypeAndQuantityNode). The default is http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#Sell.

prop.name: eligibleCustomerType
prop.desc: The type(s) of customers for which the given offer is valid.

prop.name: itemCondition
prop.desc: A predefined value from OfferItemCondition or a textual description of the condition of the product or service, or the products or services included in the offer.

prop.name: itemOffered
prop.desc: The item being offered.

prop.name: eligibleDuration
prop.desc: The duration for which the given offer is valid.

prop.name: acceptedPaymentMethod
prop.desc: The payment method(s) accepted by seller for this offer.

prop.name: eligibleRegion
prop.desc:
The ISO 3166-1 (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) or ISO 3166-2 code, the place, or the GeoShape for the geo-political region(s) for which the offer or delivery charge specification is valid.

See also ineligibleRegion.
